text.textblock: Take notice that an informal settlement conference will be convened in this proceeding on Tuesday, March 1, 1994, at 10 a.m., at the offices of the Federal Regulatory Commission, 810 First Street NE., Washington, DC, for the purpose of exploring settlement in the above-referenced docket.

Any party, as defined by 18 CFR 385.102(c), or any participant, as defined by 18 CFR 385.102(b), is invited to attend. Persons wishing to become a party must move to intervene and receive intervenor status pursuant to the Commission's regulations (18 CFR 385.214).
For additional information, contact Lorna J. Hadlock at (202) 208-0737.

doctitle.textblock: Colorado Interstate Gas Co.; Notice of Informal Settlement Conference
